title: Stage Lv10-S26
description: Level 10 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: I'm feeling kind of nostalgic. It brings back old memories.
It's a bit bittersweet. But there's nothing we can do about it.
learning_points: Level 10 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.kr: 뭔가 아련한 기분이 드네. 옛날 생각이 나.
sentences.en: I'm feeling kind of nostalgic. It brings back old memories.

sentences.kr: 좀 씁쓸하긴 해. 하지만 어쩔 수 없지 뭐.
sentences.en: It's a bit bittersweet. But there's nothing we can do about it.

sentences.kr: 마음이 복잡해. 기쁘기도 하고 아쉽기도 하고.
sentences.en: My feelings are mixed. I'm both happy and sorry.
There's this inexplicable feeling of emptiness.
It's really touching. I'm genuinely moved.
It's a bit awkward, but it's not bad.
For some reason, it makes me feel good.

sentences.kr: 살짝 아쉬운 마음이 들어. 더 할 수 있었을 텐데.
sentences.en: I feel slightly disappointed. We could have done more.
